actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To impose quantitative restrictions on the importation of Chinese textiles until the Government of the People's Republic of China grants internationally recognized worker rights.

summary.text: Anti-Repression Trade Act - Limits the amount of textile products that may be imported into the United States from the People's Republic of China after December 31, 1990. Outlines conditions for presidential termination of such limitation after December 31, 1991.

titles.title: To impose quantitative restrictions on the importation of Chinese textiles until the Government of the People's Republic of China grants internationally recognized worker rights.
